author: Special Correspondent
text:
Seventeen persons, mostly college students, were injured on Friday evening in an accident involving two buses near Nasiyanur along the Four-lane Bypass Road.

The college bus transporting students of an engineering college at Chennimalai was reportedly crossing the Bypass Road for proceeding towards Anthiyur when it fell on its side after being hit by a Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation bus proceeding to Coimbatore from Salem.

There were about 25 students in the college bus at the time of the accident, and they were all sent after out-patient treatment, police sources said.
title: Students hurt in accident
